name: Hssissk_Bloodscale
content:
Hssissk Bloodscale was a male Trandoshan who lived during the Galactic Civil War.
Hssissk Bloodscale was a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
